last_episode_to_air.name: The Little Guy
last_episode_to_air.overview: Intermittent wipers, Lego bricks, and the smiley face came from the minds of ordinary people with extraordinary stories.

name: My Million Dollar Invention
overview: Behind many million-dollar inventions are priceless stories of inspiration, controversy, triumph, and tragedy. Explore inventions large and small, lifesaving and life-taking, scary and playful, and meet the men and women who dedicated, and often risked, their lives to follow their vision and ultimately change the world.

episodes.name: Shock and Awe
episodes.overview: How the electric chair, the Ouija board, and other chilling ideas became million-dollar inventions.

episodes.name: The Vision Thing
episodes.overview: See how the TV, speed camera, photocopier, and space telescope went from sketch drawings to life-altering inventions.

episodes.name: Criminal Riches
episodes.overview: See how crime made lucrative inventions out of the house alarm, the cash register, the Tommy Gun, and even the toothbrush.

episodes.name: Danger Magnets
episodes.overview: Would you inhale toxins, leap off a cliff, or shoot yourself to prove you're right? Meet four inventors who did just that.

episodes.name: Need for Speed
episodes.overview: How did a waffle iron change the world of running shoes forever? Find out this and other invention secrets.

episodes.name: Life and Death
episodes.overview: The story of the gun meant to end violence, the box that keeps hearts beating, and the printer that can build anything.

episodes.name: Guns and Goldmines
episodes.overview: They walked through fires, faced poverty, ran for their lives, and found their fortune in gold, guns and games.

episodes.name: The Little Guy
episodes.overview: Intermittent wipers, Lego bricks, and the smiley face came from the minds of ordinary people with extraordinary stories.
